headline.main: NAZIS SAID TO SEEK WEYGAND OUSTER; Reported Urging Vichy to Make Gen. Dentz, Ex-Syria Chief, Commander in Africa

lead_paragraph: Germany has brought strong pessure -- so far unsuccessful -- upon the Vichy government for the ouster of General Maxime Weygand as French Pro-Consul for Africa and his replacement by General Henri Dentz, who directed the French defense of Syria.
abstract: Germans reptd pressing Vichy Govt to replace Weygand with Gen H Dentz

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
